blurb.text: Monster Galaxy

misc.blurb: Your Moga does not need a Blue Coffee at the moment.

blurb.text: TARGET gains AMOUNT hp from BUFF!
TARGET takes AMOUNT damage from TARGET2's BUFF!
TARGET gains AMOUNT PROPERTY from BUFF!
OPPONENT is afflicted by DEBUFF from TARGET's BUFF!
TARGET takes AMOUNT damage from DEBUFF!
TARGET loses AMOUNT PROPERTY from DEBUFF!
TARGET loses a turn from DEBUFF!
TARGET gains BUFF!
TARGET is afflicted by BUFF!
ATTACKER uses TYPE on DEFENDER to inflict DAMAGE ELEMENT damage
ATTACKER hits DEFENDER using TYPE to inflict DAMAGE ELEMENT damage
ATTACKER hits DEFENDER to inflict DAMAGE ELEMENT damage using TYPE
ATTACKER uses TYPE on DEFENDER but misses!
As DEFENDER enters, ATTACKER attacks for DAMAGE ELEMENT damage
As DEFENDER enters, ATTACKER attacks but misses!
As DEFENDER leaves the battle, ATTACKER attacks for DAMAGE ELEMENT damage
As DEFENDER leaves the battle, ATTACKER attacks but misses!
TARGET {$BLUE recharges}!
TARGET runs away!
TARGET tried to run away and failed.
Are you sure you want to run away? If you fail, you lose a turn.
Are you sure you want to send TARGET into the battle?
Blue Coffee will fully restore your Moga. Use one now?
Warning: To restore your Moga, you must let their nap run to full completion. Are you sure you want to cancel your nap?
Oops! Something went wrong. We're going to have to restart Monster Galaxy!
There was a problem starting the battle, we're going to have to restart Monster Galaxy!
There was a problem starting this battle.
Would you like to add TARGET to your team?
Would you like to remove TARGET from your team?
Before you go to the World, go to the MogaDex and add a Moga to your team.
Invite some friends to play Monster Galaxy.
It looks like you already have MONSTER.
FRIEND arrives to help!
Battle KO!
You failed to capture!
Run Away!
You captured TARGET!

Unable to water the whistle tree!
You don't have any quests yet!
Every Moga on your team has fainted. To restore them, put them in a nap or use a Blue Coffee. You can also swap in different Moga in the Team tab.
One of your Mogas is napping. You can come back later, use a Blue Coffee now, or swap in a different Moga in the Team tab so you can go out to the world.
Unable to launch home tutorial.
Unable to launch premium bundle.
Cannot use unrecognised item
Your friend's tree is ripe for harvesting. Click to harvest a whistle that you can use in battle to gain a bonus turn!
You can only harvest your friend's tree once per day.
Your friend's tree has withered. You can only harvest this tree if your friend waters it!
Your tree is ripe for harvesting. Click to harvest a whistle that you can use in battle to gain a bonus turn!
Your whistle tree is healthy, but doesn't have any whistles to harvest right now
Your whistle tree has withered away. Click to water it and restore it to full health.

Moga must be weakened before you can capture them.
CHOOSE YOUR MOGA
Error loading friends from Facebook. This is Facebook's fault. Please reload.
It looks like you are out of Star Seeds!
You can claim one Star Seed every 8 hours. You can also buy Star Seeds in the Sky shop at any time.
It looks like you are out of Blue Coffee!
You can get more by winning battles, doing quests, or buying them in the Sky Shop.
Tip of the Day
Did you know that you get XP in battle if your monster hits or gets hit but does not faint? Try and get as many of your monsters into battle without fainting to maximize your XP for your team.
Your team enters LOCATION
You are confronted by a MOGA!

Uh oh, looks like this item has already been claimed or the event has expired.
Oh no! FRIEND's tree needs to be watered!
Remind FRIEND to water their tree so you can get Bonus Attack Whistles and they get XP.

misc.blurb: This Moga's level is too high to capture.
You can only capture Mogas up to 2 levels above your Moga.
You do not have any more starseeds.\nYou can buy more starseeds or spend coins to capture this Moga.
You don't have a MOGA. MOGA is RARITY.\nWhich would you like to use?
You already have COUNT MOGA. MOGA is RARITY.\nWhich would you like to use?
You need to inflict at least 15% damage to capture this MOGA
